translate.english: beginning of a term / start of school

examples.example: 开学后我要更加努力地学习，提升自己的知识水平。

translate.english: After the beginning of the school term, I will study harder to improve my knowledge level.

examples.example: 开学啦，同学们都精神饱满地迎接新的学习生活。

translate.english: School begins, and the students are all full of energy to welcome the new study life.

examples.example: 开学的日子即将到来，我满心欢喜地准备着迎接新的挑战。

translate.english: The school opening day is coming, and I am happily preparing to meet the new challenges.
